short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost sales on Mercari by relisting your products in a snap! Simply visit the listing you want to relist and click the icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your Mercari sales by re-listing your stale products with a click!

Instead of copying and pasting your product's attributes, let the extension do it for you.

1. Visit your product's page on Mercari.
2. Click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
3. Your product's attributes will be automatically copied into a new listing.

---

This is a beta release. Please email feedback to relisterextension@gmail.com.
